animalCare.title: Air quality Solutions for Animal care

banner.title: Air quality solutions for
banner.description: A complete solution for air monitoring, air purification, and data monitoring for your fitness centers and gyms.

pollutants.title: Major Air
pollutants.description: Fitness centers and gym areas are enclosed, high-density spaces where fresh air is extremely necessary. Occupancy, panting athletes, and ventilation rates are two factors that affect the air quality indoors. Due to this, the transmission of airborne diseases and pathogens is very easy. Therefore, it is necessary to monitor the air quality and take proper measures to avoid bad air quality scenarios.

pm25.title: PM2.5
pm25.description: Microscopic breathable dust and liquid particles that enter deep into our lungs.
pm25.imgAlt: pm2.5 in fitness center and gym

co2.title: CO2
co2.description: The breathing rate of athletes is high in gyms which directly influences the CO2 levels.
co2.imgAlt: co2 gas in fitness center and gym

tvoc.title: TVOC
tvoc.description: Gym equipment and cleaning agents are some of the potential sources.

tvoc in fitness center and gym

microbial.description: Flu, cough, cold, etc. are caused when exposed to microbial pollutants.

risk.title: Who are at
risk.description: Different people from different age groups can be present in a fitness center. But certain groups are significantly impacted as compared to healthy adults.

personalTrainer.title: Personal Trainer
personalTrainer.description: Unattentiveness, a high chance of acquiring respiratory illnesses, and loss of coordination.

serviceTechnician.title: Service Technician
serviceTechnician.description: Loss of coordination, unattentiveness, etc. are very common if exposed to bad air quality.

frontDeskStaff.title: Front desk staff
frontDeskStaff.description: Bad air quality will affect every individual present in the same scenario, including the desk staff.
frontDeskStaff.imgAlt: Front desk staff in fitness center & gym

members.title: Members
members.description: Nausea, uneasiness, headaches, and breathlessness are some of the side effects of exposure.

solutions.title: Air quality
solutions.description: Prana Air air quality monitoring and purifying solutions give you the power to know what your customers and staff breathe and what you could do to clean the air to make your fitness centers and gyms 'Air pollution-free zone' and view and analyze your IAQ.
